channel.title: Battle Arena - Battle It Out GFX Style
channel.description:
[b][u]The Basics[/u][/b] - To enter this competition you MUST send me a PM to take part. You will be given a number and you must wait until your number or name is in the -Vs.- part. - You will post the link to your picture and I will put it on the first post showing the people what to vote from.
[b][u]The Current Contest[/u][/b]
Number 1 Vs. Number 2 - Solemage Vs. Poor Noob
[b][i][u]Poor Noobs[/u][/i][/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img60.imageshack.us/img60/9360/pns7wv5yu.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b][i][u]Sole Mage[/u][/i][/b] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img60.imageshack.us/img60/3255/battle7in9ep.png[/img][/URL]
[b][u]Judge Panel[/u][/b]
- Mr.Chris - KyleGut3
[i]Currently looking for judges. PM me :)[/i]
[b][u]HighScores[/u][/b]
[b] The rules for todays battles[/b]
Free style 600x130 Brushes allowed Renders allowed
PM me and I will send you back a number. Keep check ups for your number to appear. If you miss your possible entree it is an automatic DQ from the current contest.
At the moment it is a little sketchy but you will soon get the hang of it :)
